long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BitLife is a life simulation game where you take control of a character and guide them through their entire life from birth to death. You make decisions on everything from their career and relationships to their health and finances. Each choice affects your character’s happiness, success, and overall life path, creating a unique and personalized experience. The game features a variety of scenarios, challenges, and opportunities, allowing you to live out different lifestyles and explore various outcomes. With its simple yet engaging interface, BitLife offers a compelling way to experience the highs and lows of life’s journey through strategic decision-making and role-playing.
